thread.title: KKR Profit Climbs as Biggest Holdings Grow
thread.title_full: KKR Profit Climbs as Biggest Holdings Grow

title: KKR Profit Climbs as Biggest Holdings Grow
text:
KKR Profit Climbs as Biggest Holdings Grow Economic net income tops analystsâ€™ estimates By Google+ Updated July 23, 2015 5:26 p.m. ET 
KKR & Co. said its second-quarter profit more than doubled, and the firm by one measure had its best quarter ever, as some big holdings grew in value. 
The private-equity firm has in recent years amassed hefty holdings in shares of several publicly traded companies, including through public offerings or by taking shares as payment for companies it sells. 
This past quarter, KKR marked up its stakes in Walgreens Boots... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
